participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Optimistic and nurturing, Emily loves to encourage others to pursue their dreams and enjoys sharing her interests in music and nature.
participant_1.background: I'm going to drive my old car to the orchard and pick apples. I check the Steelers' score from the previous night before I start my day. I saved up my allowance for months to buy a Bruno Mars CD when I was 12 years old. I am proud of my first home purchase. I like to listen to music that motivates me to keep pushing forward despite my circumstances.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Dedicated and caring, Jake is passionate about his work and enjoys sports as a way to unwind. He values family time greatly.
participant_2.background: I fear that I will not be able to help my patients as well as I want to. My favorite band is Bon Iver. I have my own salon. I play quarterback. I am an omnivore.

content.text: Good, thank you! I am a bit nervous as I start my new job today as a doctor.
Congratulations! That is a big accomplishment. I am sure you will be great at it! What type of doctor are you?
I am going to be working in a pediatric practice.
Oh, that is wonderful! I am sure you will help a lot of families.
I hope so. I am really excited to get started.
I am sure you will do great. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to play sports, listen to music, and spend time with my family.
Those all sound like great ways to relax and have fun.
Yes, they are. Do you have any hobbies?
I like to go to the orchard to pick apples, and I also like to listen to music.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I love apples.
Me too! What is your favorite kind of apple?
I like Granny Smith apples the best.
